text:
P. O BOX 407. RADIO CITY STATION. NEW YORK 19. NEW YORK
UNITED STATES INFORMATION AGENCY
BROADCASTING SERVICE
March 2, 195k
IN REPLY REFER TO
IBS
Dear Mr. Schooley:
Correspondence which you and Graydon Ausmus have had
with Justin Miller has been passed on to me.
We have received permission from Station WABC, New York,
to allow your member stations to use the radio show "Your
Voice of America", which is produced and owned by WABC. There
will be no charge for this service, but I believe that the
stations that use it ought to pay for the recording or the tape.
These reproductions of broadcasts will be made for the Voice of
America from the WABC line.
If you will be kind enough to let us know what our next
move should be, we are prepared to go ahead right away9/n
for Broadcasting
Mr. Frank E. Schooley,
Treasurer,
National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
Radio Station WILL,
University of Illinois,
Urbana, Illinois
